cab.content: SEC RE T6WAR CABINET.360.A.Minutes of a Meeting held at 10,Downing Street,S.W. on WEDNESDAY,6th March,1913 at 12.30.p.m,PRESENT:THE PRIME MINISTER (in the Chair).The Rt Hon0The Earl Curzon of .Kedleston, K.G. ,G,C-.S.I. ,G.C.I.S. ,The Rt Hon.A,Bonar Law,M,P.,The Rt Hon.The Viscount Milner,Lieutenant-General The Rt Hon,J.C Smuts ,KaC, ,The Rt Hon.GsN0Barnes,MDP.,THE FOLLOWING TORE ALSO PRESENT:-ft1* /General Sir H0HaWilson,K0CBB0K.C.M.G.,D.S,0.;Chief of theImperial General Staff.The Hon,Sir Eric Drumrnond,K.C.M.G.,C.3.,(Por Minute 5).Mr Philip Kerr,Lieutenant-Colonel Sir M.P.A.Hankey,K.C.B.,.,.Secreta
